documentation.text: @notice Emitted when pendingRiskManagerImplementation is accepted, which means riskManager implementation is updated
@notice Emitted when pendingAdmin is accepted, which means admin is updated
@notice Emitted when pendingRiskManagerImplementation is accepted, which means riskManager implementation is updated
@notice Emitted when pendingAdmin is accepted, which means admin is updated

devdoc.details: Storage for the riskManager is at this address, while execution is delegated to the `riskManagerImplementation`. pTokens should reference this contract as their riskManager.

_acceptAdmin().details: Admin function for pending admin to accept role and update admin

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

_acceptImplementation().details: Admin function for new implementation to accept it's role as implementation

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

_setPendingAdmin(address).details: Admin function to begin change of admin. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

devdoc.title: RiskManagerCore

_acceptAdmin().notice: Accepts transfer of admin rights. msg.sender must be pendingAdmin

_acceptImplementation().notice: Accepts new implementation of riskManager. msg.sender must be pendingImplementation

_setPendingAdmin(address).notice: Begins transfer of admin rights. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.
